Header.title: Give Direction To Your Future
Header.paragraph: We came across many students who chose wrong career paths and suffered in their career because of lack of guidance. There were only a handful of career counsellors to guide them. We took an initiative to address this problem.

About.paragraph: Career Path started its journey in 2008 when we launched Indiaâ€™s first dedicated career assessment and counselling platform for career counsellors.In 2009 we realized, Career Assessment is an only diagnostic tool, not the entire solution. In India student prefer one on one career counselling. Understanding this, we decided strategically to focus and empower career counsellors by providing them with a proper career assessment tool specially designed for Indian students. We named this tool as CCPA (Comprehensive Career Planning Assessment).

Services.name: 360 Skill Test
Services.text: Take Our 360 Skill Test in which we test your knowledge of various domains and take your interest feedback in order to Provide you with Graph of various career options suitable for you.

Services.name: Activity Based Assesment
Services.text: We Recommend taking activity based assesment after 360 skill test this will target your soft skills and will assess your interest fully to achieve unmatched results. So that you can choose your future career.

Services.name: Reach out our counsellors
Services.text: Still Confused? Connect with our counsellors, they will guide you. You can tell them your interests and easily assess things, they will provide you with all resources so that you can excel in your path.

Services.name: See All Career Options from various Domains
Services.text: A list Most prestigious and high income jobs in various sectors of the different field. You have your domain? Now check various career options related to it

Services.name: Job Ready Certifications
Services.text: You are clear about everything, but finding it difficult to get a job. Take our certified courses provided by industry professionals designed by Top MNCs.

Services.name: Current Job Openings
Services.text: Current Job opening available for people looking for career in their respective field

Test360.paragraph: Developed by Phil Pelucha, Top 5% Podcast & TV host. Ranked #1 Globally for his work with B2B Consultants, Coaches & Business owners.This assessment is to benchmark your current speaking performance and identify opportunities for progressed profitable platforms.Simply answer 19 multiple-choice questions about your business's current marketing activities that allow us to know which platforms will suit you & your business.

ActivityTest.paragraph: Career Path's Interest Assessment is a quick and easy way to get a list of careers that might be a good fit for your interests.4 It will take about five minutes to answer 30 questions about what you like to doâ€”and what you donâ€™t like.After you complete the assessment, youâ€™ll get a list of careers that are a match, with information on salary, educational requirements, and job outlook. For the careers that interest you the most, youâ€™ll be able to review more information about the job and how to get a career started.
Why: Analyses you on various aspects like your interests
Knowledge to map the options that best fit you

CareerOptions.title: Commerce
CareerOptions.text: Commerce is the exchange of goods or services among two or more parties. It is the subset of business that focuses on the sale of finished or unfinished products rather than their sourcing, manufacturing, transportation, or marketing.

CareerOptions.title: Arts
CareerOptions.text: Every year millions of students complete their higher secondary education in the arts stream. History, cultures, language, music, visual arts, philosophy, and humanities, are the areas of study they can choose.

CareerOptions.title: Media
CareerOptions.text: Journalism is the activity of gathering, assessing, creating, and presenting news and information. It is also the product of these activities.Whether you want to take center stage or work behind the scenes, a degree in media and communication can open up many media careers.

CareerOptions.title: Military
CareerOptions.text: military, also known collectively as armed forces, is a heavily armed, highly organized force primarily intended for warfare. It is typically authorized and maintained by a sovereign state, with its members identifiable by their distinct military uniform.

CareerOptions.title: Education
CareerOptions.text: Teaching is certainly the most commonly known career path for students earning a degree in education, and itâ€™s a great option if you like working with children or adults in a classroom setting. Teachers prepare and educate their students for the world.

CareerOptions.title: Agriculture
CareerOptions.text: Agriculture or farming is the practice of cultivating plants and livestock.[1] Agriculture was the key development in the rise of sedentary human civilization, whereby farming of domesticated species created food surpluses that enabled people to live in cities.

CareerOptions.title: Medical
CareerOptions.text: Medicine is a highly paid and highly satisfying career. However, working in medicine has a modest direct impact, and relative to the cost and time required for medical training, it has mediocre â€˜exit opportunitiesâ€™ to other career paths, and provides little platform for advocacy. It is also highly competitive

CareerOptions.title: Engineering
CareerOptions.text: engineering, the application of science to the optimum conversion of the resources of nature to the uses of humankind.Medicine is a highly paid and highly satisfying career. However, working in medicine has a modest direct impact, and relative to the cost and time required for medical training
